caption.p: ( A): Chemical structure of alkaloids: Ephedrine. ( B): Basic Flavonoid Structure, ( C): Chemical structure of saponins: Glycyrrhizin, ( D): Structure of condensed tannin, ( E): Structure of terpenoids and phenylpropanoids, ( F): Structure of hydrolysable tannins: Galotannins and Ellagitannins [ 74, 90].
